auth.subtitle: Ticket Management System
auth.name: Full Name
auth.feature_1: Ticket creation and management with statuses and priorities
auth.feature_3: SLA levels and response time tracking
auth.feature_5: Dashboard with statistics and performance indicators

clients.title: Clients
clients.management_description: Manage clients registered in the system
clients.name: Name
clients.no_clients_found: No clients found. Add your first client to get started.
clients.no_clients_filtered: No clients found with the applied filters.
clients.no_permission: You don't have permission to access this page.
clients.admin_only: This page is reserved for system administrators and support staff.

add_client_dialog.title: Add New Client
add_client_dialog.description: Add the new client's information to the system.
add_client_dialog.link_user_description: Linking existing user as system client.
add_client_dialog.force_password_change: Force password change on next login
add_client_dialog.existing_user_alert: A user with this email already exists:
add_client_dialog.linking_user_description: This user will be updated to have client permissions and will be able to access the system.
add_client_dialog.client_added_success: The client has been added successfully.
add_client_dialog.client_linked_success: The user has been linked as a client successfully.
add_client_dialog.login_copied_desc: Login has been copied to clipboard.
add_client_dialog.password_copied_desc: Password has been copied to clipboard.
add_client_dialog.save_credentials_warning: Save these credentials! They cannot be recovered after this window is closed.
add_client_dialog.link_existing_user_desc: A user with this email was found:
add_client_dialog.link_existing_user_confirm: Do you want to link this user as a client? They will keep their current password and receive client permissions in the system.
add_client_dialog.client_linked_desc_toast: The user has been linked as a client successfully.

edit_client_dialog.title: Edit Client
edit_client_dialog.force_password_change: Force password change on next login
edit_client_dialog.updated_desc: Client information has been updated successfully.
edit_client_dialog.validation_password_min: Password must be at least 6 characters

users.title: Users
users.management_description: Manage system users, their access and permissions
users.name: Name
users.no_users_filtered: No users found with the applied filters.

status_dialog.deactivate_description: When deactivating a user, they will no longer be able to access the system, but their data will be kept for historical purposes.
status_dialog.activate_description: When activating a user, they will regain access to the system with their previous permissions.
status_dialog.deactivate_warning: This action does not permanently delete the user. Data will be kept for history and can be reactivated at any time.
status_dialog.activate_warning: When activating the user, they will be able to log in to the system again.
status_dialog.deactivated_desc: The user has been deactivated successfully.
status_dialog.activated_desc: The user has been activated successfully.

reset_password_dialog.title: Reset password
reset_password_dialog.description: Set a new password for the selected user.
reset_password_dialog.force_password_change: Force password change on next login
reset_password_dialog.success_desc: The user's password has been reset successfully.
reset_password_dialog.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters

edit_dialog.title: Edit User
edit_dialog.name: Name
edit_dialog.success_desc: User data has been updated successfully.

add_user_dialog.save_credentials_warning: Save these credentials! They cannot be recovered after this window is closed.

officials.title: Support Agents
officials.name: Name
officials.no_officials_found: No support agents found. Add your first team member to get started.
officials.no_officials_filtered: No support agents found with the applied filters.

add_official_dialog.title: Add Support Agent
add_official_dialog.description: Add a new member to your support team.
add_official_dialog.link_user_description: Linking existing user as support team agent.
add_official_dialog.name: Name
add_official_dialog.force_password_change: Force password change on next login
add_official_dialog.official_added_success: The support agent has been added successfully.
add_official_dialog.user_linked_success: The user has been linked as a support agent successfully.
add_official_dialog.save_password_warning: Save the temporary password! It cannot be recovered after this window is closed.
add_official_dialog.existing_user_alert: A user with this email already exists:
add_official_dialog.linking_user_alert: Linking existing user as support agent:
add_official_dialog.linking_user_description: This user will be updated to have support agent permissions and will be able to access the support system.
add_official_dialog.link_existing_user_desc: A user with this email was found:
add_official_dialog.link_existing_user_confirm: Do you want to link this user as a support agent? They will keep their current password and receive support agent permissions in the system.
add_official_dialog.validation_departments_required: Select at least one department for the support agent.
add_official_dialog.validation_company_required: Select a company for the support agent.
add_official_dialog.password_copied_desc: Password has been copied to clipboard.
add_official_dialog.user_linked_desc_toast: The user has been linked as a support agent successfully.

edit_official_dialog.title: Edit Support Agent
edit_official_dialog.name: Name
edit_official_dialog.force_password_change: Force password change on next login
edit_official_dialog.updated_desc: Support agent information has been updated successfully.
edit_official_dialog.validation_departments_required: Select at least one department for the support agent.
edit_official_dialog.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters

toggle_status_dialog.deactivate_description: When deactivating a support agent, they will no longer be able to access the system, but their data will be kept for historical purposes.
toggle_status_dialog.activate_description: When activating a support agent, they will regain access to the system with their previous permissions.
toggle_status_dialog.deactivate_warning: This action does not permanently delete the support agent. Data will be kept for history and can be reactivated at any time.
toggle_status_dialog.activate_warning: When activating the support agent, they will be able to log in to the system again and handle tickets.
toggle_status_dialog.deactivated_desc: The support agent has been deactivated successfully.
toggle_status_dialog.activated_desc: The support agent has been activated successfully.
